definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: I don't want to lonely sitting recalled miss, take up, put down.
sentences.chinese: 我不想孤单坐在回忆了思念，拿得起，放得下。

sentences.english: The sound of happy laughters called up memories of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 这些欢笑声使他回忆起童年时代。

sentences.english: The estimated six to seven thousand languages spoken around the globe are the repository of our collective memory and intangible heritage.
sentences.chinese: 这六七千种语言承载者我们共同的回忆和非物质遗产。

sentences.english: Perkins recalls it as a great time to be a journalist.
sentences.chinese: 帕金斯回忆说，那是一个记者的黄金时期。

sentences.english: He lived for the day, not cumbered and mortified by his memory.
sentences.chinese: 他生活在现在，从没受过自己的回忆的羞辱和妨碍。

sentences.english: Oh, darling, refresh our memory. Our silver wedding anniversary is coming.
sentences.chinese: 噢，亲爱的，回忆一下，我们的银婚纪念日快到了。

sentences.english: He whispered something in the old man's ears to jog his memory.
sentences.chinese: 他向那位老人耳语了几句，以唤起他的回忆。

sentences.english: Judy Garland, he recalls, was also fond of a tipple(9).
sentences.chinese: 据他回忆，茱蒂嘉兰也很喜欢烈性葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Paused lifts the hand in the past's light youth to cancel the recollection.
sentences.chinese: 暂停中取消回忆过去的光青年举起手。

sentences.english: Hating, he sat there. And remembering.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在那里，一边恨，一边回忆。

sentences.english: I have so many great memories from my time at Highbury and Emirates Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 我在海布里和埃米尔球场都留下了难忘的回忆。

sentences.english: They were distressful memories to her.
sentences.chinese: 它们都是使她感到悲伤的回忆。

sentences.english: The third step is learning how to use positive memories to reinvent yourself.
sentences.chinese: 第三步是学会如何用积极的回忆来再创造自己。

sentences.english: But when I think back I can remember that Mark Tremonti definitely did.
sentences.chinese: 但回忆起来，我记得马克特雷蒙蒂确实那样想过。

sentences.english: As far as I can recollect, he wasn't home until 6 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 就我所能回忆起来的，他到6点钟才回家。

sentences.english: The old worker would not cast off the ragged coat that reminded him of the old days.
sentences.chinese: 老工人不愿丢掉那件使他回忆起过去岁月的破褂子。

definition: to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
lit. carved in bones and engraved in the heart (idiom)/fig. etched in one's memory/unforgettable
bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
